attributes.action: Let the people decide the date of eid celebration in the Harrow central mosque
attributes.additional_details:
The Harrow central mosque announced a different date for eid prayer and would not allow prayers for eid on any other day thus this shows they do not support the community but rather the beliefs of one sect of islam. 
Evidence is the announcement of eid prayer on a different date compared to the date that the  majority of Muslim worshippers announce.
attributes.background: Harrow central mosque is a community mosque used by many people from a variety of different backgrounds however the majority of Muslims celebrate eid based on the date announced by Saudi Arabia as the first day of eid.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Harrow Central Mosque.
